10 PCLS:PMODE 2,1:SCREEN 1,1
20 SIZE=1.2:XC=128:YC=90
30 REM
40 READX,Y,X1,Y1
50 IFX=999THEN100
60 FX=X*SIZE+XC:FY=176-(Y+YC)
70 LX=X1*SIZE+XC:LY=176-(Y1+YC)
80 LINE(FX,FY)-(LX,LY),PSET:LINE(FX+1,FY)-(LX+1,LY),PSET
90 GOTO40
100 GOSUB300
110 X=24:Y=84:M$="WHAT ME WORRY3":GOSUB400:LINE(198,176)-(212,182),PRESET,BF
120 LINE(208,176)-(209,178),PSET,BF:LINE(208,180)-(209,182),PSET,BF
130 LINE(98,180)-(94,184),PSET

140 M$=INKEY$:IFM$=""THEN140
150 PMODE1,1:SCREEN1,1
160 M$=INKEY$:IFM$=""THEN160
170 PMODE2,1:SCREEN1,1
180 GOTO140

300 DIMC(258),A,B,R,C,T,I:X=0:Y=0
310 FORI=0TO258:READC(I):NEXT:RETURN
340 I=ASC(B$)-48:IFI>15THENI=I-6
350 IFI=-16OR(I<0ORI>37)THENI=10
390 I=I*7
391 FORR=0TO6:A=C(I+R):FORC=0TO4:B=A-INT(A/2)*2:A=INT(A/2):IFBTHENPSET((X+4-C)*2,(Y+R)*2):PSET((X+4-C)*2,(Y+R)*2+1)
392 NEXT:NEXT:X=X+6:RETURN
400 FORT=1TOLEN(M$):B$=MID$(M$,T,1):GOSUB340:NEXT:RETURN
